attributes.action: Paedophiles should get a longer sentence when convicted
attributes.additional_details:
Paedophiles should get a longer sentences when convicted 
For example: minimum sentence 10 years maximum 100 years 
It’s not fair that convicted paedophiles get less of a sentence, their not going to learn a lesson. And their victims have to live with what their abusers have done to them for the rest of their lives.
attributes.background: Paedophiles should get a longer sentences when convicted

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Mandatory life sentence for child sexual abuse: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/562527

Increase the sentence for child sexual abuse to 25 years: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575469
